info.title: Dali IoT
info.description: *This API documentation is **work in progress**.In addition to the REST API, there is also a **websocket API** which provides asynchronous events for status updates etc. Documentation for this websocket API will be available soon.*

get.description: Get a list of all devices known to the Dali IoT

delete.description:
*Delete all devices*

**Important**: Does not change the configuration of the devices

get.description: *Get the information and features about a device*

delete.description:
*Delete the record of a single device*

**Important**: Does not change the configuration of the device

post.description: *Control the features of one device by id*
*Control the features of one group by id*
Control the features of one zone, using its unique identifier.

get.description: Get the status of the currently active dali-scan.

post.description:
Start a new dali scan.

Note:

- If ``newInstallation`` is ``true``, all dali devices will be deleted prior to performing the scan.
- If a scan is already active, this will not start a new one!
- ``useLines`` can be used to only scan on a set of line numbers.

put.description: *Update the name of the Dali IoT device*

delete.description:
- *Deletes all automations and DALI gears*

- *Resets the configuration of this device*

- *Automatically reboots afterwards*

get.description:
Retrieve the current protocol settings.
Only supported settings are returned, for everything else default values are in place.


To change any of these settings, send a PUT /settings request.

put.description:
Updates the protocol settings

Following parameters are set by default and not changable:
```
send_during_initialize=False
send_during_quiescent=False
events=True
send_frame_events=True
recv_frame_events=True
send_buffer_events=False
macro_events=True
tick_in_events=True
line_in_events=True
bus_power_supply=False
```

get.description: Get a list of all virtual zones known to the application.

Get a virtual zone, using its unique identifier.

Returns:
    A zone, or a 404 error if no zone was found.

put.description: Update a virtual zone, using its unique identifier.

delete.description: Delete a virtual zone, using its unique identifier.

post.description: Add a new virtual zone, with an optional name and list of targets.

get.description: Retrieves the currently stored email settings.

put.description:
Updates the stored email settings.

Individual settings are optional and will only be updated when they are sent in the request
body. Settings must be explicitly set to ``null`` to delete a stored record.

post.description:
Sends a test message to the stored receivers, using the stored mail configuration.

``notifications.mailReceivers`` as well as all ``mailConfig`` fields must be configured for a
test message to work.

put.description: Test a sequence without storing it permanently.

post.description:
Start executing a sequence, then return whether it was started.

Returns:
    A 200 response, if the sequence was started, or a 404 response if no sequence was found.

Stop executing a sequence, then return whether it was stopped.

Returns:
    A 200 response, if the sequence was stopped, or a 404 response if no sequence was found.

Start executing a circadian, then return whether it was started.

Returns:
    A 200 response, if the circadian was started, or a 404 response if no circadian was found.

Stop executing a circadian, then return whether it was stopped.

Returns:
    A 200 response, if the circadian was stopped, or a 404 response if no circadian was found.

Start executing a scheduler, then return whether it was started.

Returns:
    A 200 response, if the scheduler was started, or a 404 response if no scheduler was found.

Stop executing a scheduler, then return whether it was stopped.

Returns:
    A 200 response, if the scheduler was stopped, or a 404 response if no scheduler was found.

Start executing a trigger action automation, then return whether it was started.

Returns:
    A 200 response, if the automation was started, or a 404 response if no automation was found.

Stop executing a trigger action automation, then return whether it was stopped.

Returns:
    A 200 response, if the automatino was stopped, or a 404 response if no automation was found.

r.title: R
r.description: Relative red value in the [0, 1] interval.

g.title: G
g.description: Relative green value in the [0, 1] interval.

b.title: B
b.description: Relative blue value in the [0, 1] interval.

w.title: W
w.description: Relative white value in the [0, 1] interval.

a.title: A
a.description: Relative amber value in the [0, 1] interval.

f.title: F
f.description: Relative free color value in the [0, 1] interval.

x.title: X
x.description: X coordinate in the CIE color chromaticity space.

y.title: Y
y.description: Y coordinate in the CIE color chromaticity space.

switchable.title: switchable
switchable.description: Whether to switch a device on (``true``) or off (``false``).

dimmable.title: dimmable
dimmable.description: Percentage in the [0, 100] interval to dim a device to.

dimmableWithFade.title: dimmableWithFade
dimmableWithFade.description: Percentage in the [0, 100] interval to dim a device to, within a fade time in seconds.

gotoLastActiveWithFade.title: gotoLastActiveWithFade
gotoLastActiveWithFade.description: Dim to the last level within a fade time in seconds.

scene.title: scene
scene.description: Scene number of the scene to recall.

sceneWithFade.title: sceneWithFade
sceneWithFade.description: Scene number of the scene to recall, within a fade time in seconds.

fadeTime.title: fadeTime
fadeTime.description: Set the fade time in seconds.

fadeRate.title: fadeRate
fadeRate.description: Set the fade rate in steps per second.

saveToScene.title: saveToScene
saveToScene.description: Scene number of the scene to save to.

colorRGB.title: colorRGB
colorRGB.description: Relative red, green and blue color values in the [0, 1] interval.

dimmableRGB.title: dimmableRGB
dimmableRGB.description: Dim relative colors RGB in the [0, 1] interval and brightness in percent.

colorRGBWithFade.title: colorRGBWithFade
colorRGBWithFade.description: Relative red, green and blue color values in the [0, 1] interval, within a fade time in seconds.

colorWAF.title: colorWAF
colorWAF.description: Relative white, amber and free color values in the [0, 1] interval.

dimmableWAF.title: dimmableWAF
dimmableWAF.description: Dim relative colors WAF in the [0, 1] interval and brightness in percent.

colorWAFWithFade.title: colorWAFWithFade
colorWAFWithFade.description: Relative white, amber and free color values in the [0, 1] interval, within a fade time in seconds.

dimmableKelvin.title: dimmableKelvin
dimmableKelvin.description: Dim color tempature in Kelvin and brightness in percent.

colorKelvinWithFade.title: colorKelvinWithFade
colorKelvinWithFade.description: Color temperature in Kelvin, within a fade time in seconds.

colorXY.title: colorXY
colorXY.description: Coordinates in the CIE color chromaticity space.

dimmableXY.title: dimmableXY
dimmableXY.description: Dim color coordinates in the CIE color chromaticity space and brightness in percent.

colorXYWithFade.title: colorXYWithFade
colorXYWithFade.description: Coordinates in the CIE color chromaticity space, within a fade time in seconds.

dimmable.title: Dimmable
dimmable.description: Percentage in the [0, 100] interval to dim a device to.

MailConfig.title: MailConfig
MailConfig.description:
Mail sending configuration.

All values are optional. Only provided settings are updated. Explicitly setting a value to
``null`` is required to clear it.

password.title: Password
password.description: Whether a password is currently stored (``True``) or not (``False``).

MailSettings.title: MailSettings
MailSettings.description: A complete set of mail settings, made of sender configuration and notifications.

NotificationSettings.title: NotificationSettings
NotificationSettings.description: Configure which tests should notify whom, by mail.

isMacro.title: Ismacro
isMacro.description: Whether the sequence is a DALI macro.

dali_ping.title: Dali Ping
dali_ping.description: Enable/Disable the periodic sending of a ping command over the DALI bus

TestNotificationSettings.title: TestNotificationSettings
TestNotificationSettings.description: Configure whether to notify test success or failure, by mail.

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier of a device or group. Required for ``device`` and ``group`` type, omitted for ``d16group`` and ``d16gear``.

address.title: Address
address.description: Address of a DALI gear or DALI group. Required for ``d16group`` and ``d16gear`` type, omitted for ``device`` and ``group``.

line.title: Line
line.description: Line number of a DALI gear or DALI group. Required for ``d16group`` and ``d16gear`` type, omitted for ``device`` and ``group``.

name.title: Name
name.description: A user defined, human readable name for the zone.

targets.title: Targets
targets.description: The effective range of the zone.

ZoneModel.title: ZoneModel

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique identifier of the zone.

name.title: Name
name.description: A user defined, human readable name for the zone.

targets.title: Targets
targets.description: The effective range of the zone.

ZoneModel.description: Represent a zone: a collection of devices (targets).

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique identifier of the zone.

name.title: Name

targets.title: Targets
targets.description: The effective range of the zone.

ZoneResponse.description: Represent a zone: a collection of devices (targets).

tags.name: control
tags.description:
Endpoints to control devices
- **switchable**: *Turns the device on or off*
- **dimmable**: *Dims the device to a given percentage*
- **gotoLastActive**: *Turns the device on to it's last active level*
- **scene**: *Set the device to a given scene*
- **saveToScene**: *Store the current configuration to scene*
- **colorRGB**: *Set the device to a given RGB (red, green, blue) value from 0.0-1.0*
- **colorWAF**: *Set the device to a given WAF (white, amber, freecolour) value from 0.0-1.0*
- **colorKelvin**: *Set the device to a given color temperature in Kelvin*
- **colorXY**: *Set the device to a given XY color coordinate*

tags.name: zones
tags.description: Endpoints for managing zones. Zones may contain devices, other zones, DALI groups or DALI broadcasts; all of which can be controlled with a single request.
